analysis.key_quote: I believe the reclassification of the career civil service employees who participate in the development of funding announcements and oversee the review of grant applications as Schedule F would politicize civil servants in federal agencies and reduce public trust in Federally-funded programs.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed changes, highlighting concerns about the politicization of civil service and its impact on public trust, which aligns with the indicators for opposition.
